name: OUR DARKEST HOURS
description:
TOP DOWN  |  CO-OP   |  HORROR YOUR VISION IS LIMITED TO THE LIGHT OF YOUR FLASHLIGHT.
  • Against the monsters the players only have their flashlight as weapon
  • With a limited battery, players will have to work together in order to survive
  • Save yourselves in abandonned underground stations
  • Survive together or die together
CORE TEAM DESIGN
  • LEAD GAME DESIGNER - Aurore Bury
  • GAME DESIGNER/BALANCER - Adrien Delahaye
  • LEVEL DESIGNER/ARTIST - Laura MasMaury
PROGRAMMING
  • LEAD GAME DEVELOPER - Romain Foucher
  • GAME DEVELOPER - Pierre Bailly
SOUND DESIGN
  • LEAD SOUND DESIGNER - Augustin Courcoux
  • COMPOSER - Lionel Guenoun
VOICE ACTORS
  • VICTORIA - Tyneille Louise
  • JOHNSON - Manuel Sinor
PRODUCING
  • PRODUCER - Robin Chaffard
